languages.text: Периодически частицы металла утрачивают цвет, становятся полупрозрачными, и за ними проступает кто-то темный и бесформенный, жаждущий родиться, но не способный... пока что.
Every few moments, the metal particles lose their colour and become translucent — and you can see something dark and formless behind the metal, yearning to be born, but unable to do so... yet.
languages.original_text: Периодически частицы металла утрачивают цвет, становятся полупрозрачными, и за ними проступает кто-то темный и бесформенный, жаждущий родиться, но не способный... пока что.

traits.locale_text: "The metal particles lose they colour from time to time, becoming transparent, and something dark and formless can be see behind it, wishing to get born, but is not able to do so... yet.
"The metal particles lose they colour from time to time, becoming transparent, and something dark and formless can be see behind it, wishing to get born, but is not able to do so... yet.
"The metal particles lose their colour from time to time, becoming semitransparent, and something dark and formless can be seen behind it, striving to get born, but unable to do so... yet.
"The metal particles lose their colour from time to time, becoming semitransparent, and something dark and formless can be seen behind it, striving to get born, but unable to do so... yet.
Every few moments, the metal particles lose their colour and become translucent — and you can see something dark and formless behind the metal, yearning to be born, but unable to do so... yet.
Every few moments, the metal particles lose their colour and become translucent — and you can see something dark and formless behind the metal, yearning to be born, but unable to do so... yet.

languages.text: Par moments, les particules métalliques perdent leur couleur et deviennent translucides. Elles laissent alors apparaître derrière elles une chose sombre et informe qui s'efforce de naître... mais n'y parvient pas encore.
languages.original_text: Every few moments, the metal particles lose their colour and become translucent — and you can see something dark and formless behind the metal, yearning to be born, but unable to do so... yet.

traits.locale_text: Par moments, les particules métalliques perdent leur couleur et deviennent translucides. Elles laissent alors apparaître derrière elles une chose sombre et informe qui s'efforce de naître... mais n'y parvient pas encore.

languages.text: Cada pocos momentos, las partículas de metal pierden el color y se vuelven translúcidas, dejando ver algo oscuro e informe al otro lado. Ansía nacer, pero no puede... por ahora.
languages.original_text: Every few moments, the metal particles lose their colour and become translucent — and you can see something dark and formless behind the metal, yearning to be born, but unable to do so... yet.

traits.locale_text: Las partículas de metal pierden color ocasionalmente, con lo que se vuelven semitransparentes y, a través de ellas, puede verse algo oscuro e informe al otro lado, luchando por nacer, pero incapaz de lograrlo... por ahora.

languages.text: 每隔一段时间，这些金属颗粒便会失去色彩，变成半透明的状态。你看到这些金属颗粒后面存在着某种无形的黑暗之物，想要化为实体……但目前还无法改变形态。
languages.original_text: Every few moments, the metal particles lose their colour and become translucent — and you can see something dark and formless behind the metal, yearning to be born, but unable to do so... yet.

traits.locale_text: 这些金属颗粒时不时地失去色彩，变成半透明的状态。在这些颗粒之后，存在着某种无形的黑暗之物，想要化为实体……但却无法化为实体。

languages.text: 僅かな間、金属粒子は色を失って半透明になる。あなたはその奥に、暗くて形のない何かを見つけた。それは生まれいでようとしているものの、生まれてはいない…今はまだ。
languages.original_text: Every few moments, the metal particles lose their colour and become translucent — and you can see something dark and formless behind the metal, yearning to be born, but unable to do so... yet.

traits.locale_text: 僅かな間、金属粒子は色を失って半透明になる。あなたはその奥に、暗くて形のない何かを見つけた。それは生まれいでようとしているものの、生まれてはいない…今はまだ。

languages.text: Ab und an verlieren die Metallpartikel ihre Farbe und werden durchsichtig ... und du erkennst etwas Dunkles und Gestaltloses hinter dem Metall, das geboren werden möchte, es aber nicht kann ... noch nicht.
languages.original_text: Every few moments, the metal particles lose their colour and become translucent — and you can see something dark and formless behind the metal, yearning to be born, but unable to do so... yet.

traits.locale_text: "Die Metallpartikel verlieren gelegentlich ihre Farbe, werden semitransparent, und etwas Dunkles und Formloses ist dahinter zu sehen, strebt danach, geboren zu werden, kann es jedoch nicht ... noch nicht.

languages.text: Metal parçacıklar, birkaç saniyede bir renklerini kaybedip şeffaflaşıyor. Metalin ardında doğmak için sabırsızlanan fakat henüz bunu başaramayan, karanlık ve biçimsiz bir şey görüyorsun.
languages.original_text: Every few moments, the metal particles lose their colour and become translucent — and you can see something dark and formless behind the metal, yearning to be born, but unable to do so... yet.
